modName: Unlevelled World - Wars in Skyrim IV Patch
summary: Patch to make Foxtrot\'s Unlevelled Worlds mod compatible with Wars in Skyrim IV.
descriptionHtml:
This is an unofficial patch for Foxtrot\'s Unlevelled Worlds mod (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6206) to make it compatible with Wars in Skyrim IV (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6176).

This patch will remove player level dependence from WiS content, meaning you can literally stumble across ANY combination of encounters right from Level 1.

For best results, use this load order:

-Unlevelled Worlds
-WiS IV
-Any WiS optionals or patches you might be using (see WiS instructions)
-Unlevelled Worlds Wars in Skyrim IV Patch

I\'d also HIGHLY recommend bash-patching after activating these, to merge the level lists.

You shouldn\'t encounter any problems with this, but if you do, please let me know!
author: Moogiefluff
